mapper.select:
select a.* from BI_RULE_END2 a
and a.MASTERGUID=#MASTERGUID# and a.DATASEQ=#DATASEQ# and a.END2CONDITION=#END2CONDITION# and a.GUID=#GUID#
order by DATASEQ
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BI_RULE_END2 ( guid, masterguid, DATASEQ, end2condition,
createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid
) select #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MASTERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ:NUMERIC#, #END2CONDITION:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE BI_RULE_END2 SET
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, MASTERGUID=#MASTERGUID#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, END2CONDITION=#END2CONDITION#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
